name: Thirteen Deadly Sims
description:
This game is part of the Giant ROM 5 Game jam.

Thirteen Deadly Sims is a micro-game collection inspired by the series of the same name.

Featuring beautiful hand-drawn renditions of the Giant Bomb crew and friends, gripping gameplay, and Rorie, the greatest dog you'll ever see.

Mouse controls only. Use a trackpad for hard mode.

Find out more on GiantBomb.com.
